title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained CLI and server that runs Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun, and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM backend for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now “Open WebUI”)—chat interface, model management, RAG, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run and chat with Ollama models inside buffers; supports selection prompts and streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and embedding support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate exposing typed async wrappers over Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm, and chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack bot that answers questions using Ollama models and keeps conversation history per channel.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot server in Go that proxies group and private chats to any Ollama model.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfiles for quantized LLMs, code, and multimodal models.

title: ollama-experiments
summary: Research repo with experimental features like multi-modal vision, tool use, and fine-tuning scripts.
